title: Chicken noodle soup
description: Use up leftover chicken carcasses in the Hairy Biker's recipe for a comforting bowl of chicken soup.Each serving provides 134kcal, 10g protein, 21g carbohydrate (of which 0g sugars), 1.5g fat (of which 0.3g saturates), 0.4g fibre and 1g salt.
ingredients: 1-2 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to serve
